name: Lil Space Marines
description:
And all consuming and ever replicating threat has emerged in the galaxy and it's up to you to stop it. Kill the Roaches before they spread across the system.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim and shoot
  • 'B' to open build menu
  • 'Q' to build
  • 'E' to interact with built structures

Objective:

  • Collect minerals by shooting at them.
  • Travel the system killing all Roaches you come across.
  • Beware, even a single Roach will replicate, taking over planets and, eventually, travelling to others.

This is a very unfinished prototype. You cannot die or win. You can mine for resources, build a shuttle, travel to other planets, and fight Roaches. After a short period of time, Roaches will launch themselves from the far red planet to the others in the system.
